push: {"attachments":[{"author_icon":"{{{sender.avatar_url}}}","author_link":"{{{sender.html_url}}}","author_name":"{{{pusher.name}}}","fallback":"{{{pusher.name}}} pushed {{{commits.length}}} commits to {{{repository.full_name}}}","text":"`{{{head_commit.sha}}}`: {{{head_commit.message}}}","footer":"{{{ref}}} now at {{{after}}}.","title":"{{{commits.length}}} commits pushed to {{{repository.full_name}}}","title_link":"{{{head_commit.url}}}"}]}
ping_repository: {"text": "**PING!** Looks like the webhook for the `{{{repository.full_name}}}` repository on GitHub has been set up correctly. You can safely delete this message."}
ping_organization: {"text": "**PING!** Looks like the webhook for the `{{{organization.login}}}` organization on GitHub has been set up correctly. You can safely delete this message."}
fork: {"attachments":[{"author_icon":"{{{forkee.owner.avatar_url}}}","author_link":"{{{forkee.owner.html_url}}}","author_name":"{{{forkee.owner.login}}}","fallback":"{{{forkee.owner.login}}} forked {{{repository.full_name}}} to {{{forkee.full_name}}}","footer":"{{{repository.full_name}}} has been forked {{{repository.forks}}} times.","title":"{{{repository.full_name}}} forked to {{{forkee.full_name}}}","title_link":"{{{forkee.html_url}}}"}]}
